item.title: 据《信息报》报道，OpenAI 首席执行官称董事会将拒绝马斯克 970 亿美元的收购要约
item.description: 据《信息报》周一报道，OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）在一条信息中告诉员工，公司董事会打算明确表示对埃隆-马斯克的 "所谓出价 "不感兴趣。【原文：OpenAI CEO Sam Altman told staff in a message that the company's board of directors intends to make clear it has no interest in Elon Musk's "supposed bid", the Information reported on Monday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国 CATL 计划本周提交香港上市申请，以筹集至少 50 亿美元资金
item.description: 据两位直接知情人士透露，中国电池巨头 CATL 计划本周提交香港上市申请，以筹集至少 50 亿美元资金。【原文：Chinese battery giant CATL plans to file its Hong Kong listing application to raise at least $5 billion this week, according to two sources with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 官员称香港将就美国关税向世贸组织投诉
item.description: 香港特区政府政务司司长陈家强周二表示，香港将就美国最近对香港征收关税一事向世界贸易组织提出申诉，声称美国完全无视香港作为独立关税区的地位。【原文：Hong Kong will file a complaint on recent U.S. tariffs imposed on the city to the World Trade Organization, claiming the U.S. has completely ignored the city's status as a separate customs territory, chief secretary Eric Chan said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 新朋、吉利汽车股价下跌，因担心比亚迪推进智能驾驶
item.description: 周二，中国汽车制造商新鹏汽车和吉利汽车股价暴跌，原因是担心它们将难以与比亚迪竞争，比亚迪几乎全线免费提供智能驾驶功能。【原文：Shares in Chinese automakers Xpeng and Geely Auto tumbled on Tuesday on worries that they will struggle to compete against BYD's move to offer smart driving features across almost all of its line-up for free.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，激进主义者埃利奥特持有菲利普斯 66 公司超过 25 亿美元的股份
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一报道，激进主义者埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）已持有菲利普斯 66 超过 25 亿美元的股份，并计划推动这家炼油企业考虑进行运营变革，以提振其股价。【原文：Activist Elliott Investment Management has built an over $2.5 billion stake in Phillips 66 and plans to push the oil refiner to consider operational changes to boost its stock price, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.】

item.title: 投资者消化美国新的钢铝关税政策，石油价格持稳
item.description: 油价周二持稳，交易商正在消化新一轮贸易关税，这次是对美国进口的所有钢铁和铝征收25%的关税，这可能会对全球最大石油消费国的全球经济和能源需求造成压力。【原文：Oil prices were steady on Tuesday as traders digested another round of trade tariffs, this time a 25% levy on all U.S. imports of steel and aluminium, which could weigh on global economic and energy demand in the world's biggest oil consumer.】

item.title: 新华社：特斯拉上海巨型电池组工厂投产
item.description: 中国官方通讯社新华社称，特斯拉位于上海的特大型电池工厂已于周二投产。【原文：Tesla's battery megafactory in Shanghai, for manufacturing its megapack batteries, has launched production on Tuesday, Chinese official news agency Xinhua said.】

item.title: 最新关税举措支撑美元；关注鲍威尔和美国通胀
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普大幅提高钢铝进口关税，并表示将在未来几天宣布对其他国家征收对等关税的计划后，美元周二走强。【原文：The dollar firmed on Tuesday after U.S. President Donald Trump moved to substantially raise tariffs on steel and aluminium imports and said he would announce plans to impose reciprocal tariffs on other countries over the coming days.】

item.title: 贝恩资本称可能撤回对富士软的要约收购提案
item.description: 美国私募股权公司贝恩资本（Bain Capital）表示，可能会撤回其对日本 IT 公司富士软（Fuji Soft）的要约收购提案，因为在一场旷日持久的竞购战中，竞争对手 KKR 将报价提高到了贝恩的报价之上。【原文：U.S. private equity firm Bain Capital said it may withdraw its tender offer proposal for Japanese IT firm Fuji Soft , after rival suitor KKR raised its offer above Bain's in a protracted bidding war.】

item.title: 比亚迪下调入门价格后，中国 Leapmotor 推出售价 2 万美元的智能电动汽车
item.description: 就在比亚迪降低智能电动汽车入门价格的前一天，Stellantis 的中国合作伙伴 Leapmotor 周二推出了一款采用智能驾驶技术的新型电动汽车，售价低于 15 万元人民币（20,535 美元）。【原文：Leapmotor , the Chinese partner of Stellantis , on Tuesday launched a new electric vehicle with smart driving technology priced under 150,000 yuan ($20,535), a day after BYD slashed the entry price for such smart EVs.】

item.title: 调查显示：即使经济形势放缓，澳大利亚企业信心仍有所改善
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，由于销售和利润走软，衡量澳大利亚一月份商业活动的指标有所放缓，不过，由于借贷成本有望在短期内降低，人们的信心得到了提振。【原文：A measure of Australian business activity eased in January as sales and profits softened, a survey showed on Tuesday, though confidence got a boost amid hopes for a near-term reduction in borrowing costs.】

item.title: 关税风险引发通胀，美联储下一次降息将等待数月：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，大多数经济学家此前预计美联储将在 3 月份降息，而面对通胀上升的威胁，美联储将等到下个季度才会再次降息。【原文：Faced with the threat of rising inflation, the U.S. Federal Reserve will wait until next quarter before cutting rates again, according to a majority of economists in a Reuters poll who previously expected a March cut.】

item.title: 在欧洲，英国招聘广告最有可能包含薪资详情
item.description: 周二，招聘平台 Indeed 的调查显示，在欧洲主要国家的雇主中，英国雇主最有可能在招聘广告中提供详细的薪资信息，有 71% 的雇主这样做，而德国只有 16%。【原文：British employers are the most likely among those in major European countries to include salary details when they advertise a job, with 71% doing so compared to just 16% in Germany, research from recruitment platform Indeed showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 调查显示 2 月份澳大利亚消费者保持谨慎
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，2月份澳大利亚消费者情绪依然低迷，未能从通胀放缓或对即将降息的猜测中受益。【原文：Australian consumer sentiment remained in the doldrums in February, a survey showed on Tuesday, failing to benefit from slowing inflation or speculation about an imminent cut in interest rates.】

item.title: 澳大利亚顶级银行 CBA 上半年盈利面临巨大估值风险
item.description: 澳大利亚联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank of Australia）强劲的资产质量有望帮助该银行在上半年实现微弱的现金盈利增长，但分析师认为，在宏观经济不利因素不断增加的情况下，该银行的高估值似乎难以维持。【原文：Commonwealth Bank of Australia's strong asset quality is expected to help the lender deliver marginal cash earnings growth in the first half, though analysts believe its lofty valuation seems untenable amid rising macroeconomic headwinds.】

item.title: 特朗普表示将在未来两天内宣布对等关税措施
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一表示，他将在未来两天内宣布对其他国家征收对等关税的计划。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday said he would announce plans to impose reciprocal tariffs on other countries over the next two days.】

item.title: 墨西哥卡洛斯-斯利姆称正在评估 "复杂 "的深水天然气项目
item.description: 墨西哥亿万富翁投资者卡洛斯-斯利姆（Carlos Slim）周一表示，他的团队正在重新评估与国家石油公司 Pemex 签订的开发墨西哥首个深水天然气田的协议。【原文：Mexican billionaire investor Carlos Slim said on Monday that his team is reevaluating a deal inked with state oil company Pemex to develop Mexico's first deepwater natural gas field, a project long plagued by problems over its commercial viability.】

item.title: 美国流感疫苗接种率下降损害了澳大利亚 CSL 公司的利润增长
item.description: 澳大利亚生物制药公司 CSL 周二表示，其最大市场美国的免疫接种率下降，影响了其疫苗销售和上半年的利润增长，导致其股价下跌。【原文：Australian biopharmaceutical company CSL said on Tuesday that falling immunisation rates in the U.S., its largest market, weighed on its vaccine sales and first-half profit growth, sending its shares lower.】

item.title: 西南航空公司任命汤姆-多克西为首席财务官
item.description: 西南航空公司周一表示，已任命汤姆-多克西（Tom Doxey）为首席财务官。【原文：Southwest Airlines said on Monday it had named Tom Doxey as its chief financial officer.】

item.title: 美国消费者监督机构闲置后，案件审理陷入困境
item.description: 特朗普政府对消费者金融保护局（CFPB）的闲置使该机构在乔-拜登总统任期的最后几天里针对公司和大型金融公司提起的重大案件陷入了僵局。【原文：The Trump administration's idling of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB) left in limbo significant cases the agency brought against companies and large financial firms in the waning days of President Joe Biden's time in office.】

item.title: 澳大利亚总理称特朗普将考虑豁免澳大利亚钢铁关税
item.description: 澳大利亚总理安东尼-阿尔巴内斯（Anthony Albanese）周二表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）已同意考虑豁免澳大利亚的钢铝关税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump has agreed to consider an exemption for Australia over steel and aluminium tariffs, Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 专家称，美国消费者局的动荡让消费者无所适从
item.description: 专家表示，特朗普政府迅速解散美国消费者保护监督机构将对持有信用卡、抵押贷款和银行账户的消费者产生广泛影响，使美国人在感到受到金融机构不公平对待时几乎没有追索权。【原文：The Trump administration's rapid dismantling of the U.S. consumer protection watchdog will have broad implications for consumers with credit cards, mortgages and bank accounts, leaving Americans with little recourse if they feel they are unfairly treated by their financial institutions, experts say.】

item.title: 早间竞标在关税 "假新闻 "暴风雪中寻求澄清
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 囊性纤维化治疗需求旺盛，Vertex 预测 2025 年收入可观
item.description: Vertex Pharmaceuticals 公司周一预计，由于囊性纤维化药物销售强劲以及一种新批准的非阿片类止痛药的早期贡献，该公司的年收入将大大高于华尔街的预期。【原文：Vertex Pharmaceuticals forecast annual revenue largely above Wall Street estimates on Monday, banking on robust sales of its cystic fibrosis drugs and early contributions from a newly approved non-opioid painkiller.】

item.title: 化妆品需求放缓，Coty季度收入不及预期
item.description: 科蒂公司（Coty）周一下调了年度利润预期，此前该公司第二季度营收未达预期，原因是该公司正努力应对美国化妆品需求放缓以及零售商对美容品库存的更严格控制。【原文：Coty cut its annual profit forecast on Monday after missing second-quarter revenue estimates on Monday, as it grapples with slowing demand for cosmetics in the United States and a tighter control of beauty inventory by retailers.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，埃隆-马斯克领导的集团出价 974 亿美元收购 OpenAI 的控制权
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一报道，以亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）为首的投资者财团正在出价 974 亿美元收购控制人工智能初创公司 OpenAI 的非营利组织。【原文：A consortium of investors led by billionaire Elon Musk is offering $97.4 billion to buy the nonprofit that controls artificial intelligence startup OpenAI, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.】

item.title: 在 "恐慌性购买 "的影响下，纽约咖啡价格上涨 6%，创下新纪录
item.description: 周一，纽约咖啡期货在 ICE 交易所上涨了 6%以上，创下了每磅 4.30 美元以上的历史新高，一些市场参与者称，由于咖啡供应有限，市场出现了恐慌情绪。【原文：Coffee futures in New York rose more than 6% on Monday in the ICE exchange to a fresh all-time high above $4.30 per pound, with some market participants citing panic in the market amid limited coffee availability.】

item.title: 特朗普质疑美国政府债务数据，债券交易员举棋不定
item.description: 周一，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周末发表的关于调查国债支付欺诈行为的讲话令债券投资者失去了平衡，一些人希望这些讲话预示着未来发债量的回落。【原文：Bond investors were thrown off balance on Monday by U.S. President Donald Trump's weekend remarks on investigating Treasury debt payments for fraud, with some hoping they signaled a future pullback in debt issuance.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局推翻拜登的决定，恢复 "告飞行员书 "飞行员信息名称
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）周一表示，将推翻四年前重新命名飞行员信息的决定，恢复之前的 "飞行员通知"（Notice to Airmen）一词。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration said on Monday it is reversing a four-year-old decision to rename pilot messages and reinstating the prior "Notice to Airmen" term.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会聘请传统基金会政策校友担任技术主管
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会已任命保守派传统基金会的前技术政策研究员担任首席技术官。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission has named a former tech policy researcher from the conservative Heritage Foundation as its chief technology officer.】
